polling_data.Poll: Deadline for publishing election polls; under Israeli law, publishing election polls in the last five days before an election is prohibited.[3][4]
PM Netanyahu delivers a speech about Iran to a joint meeting of U.S. Congress[25]
Television debate of the leaders of all parties except Likud, Zionist Union, and UTJ
Deadline for parties to submit final Knesset candidate lists to the Central Elections Commission
Otzma Yehudit and Yachad reach agreement to run a joint list[67]
United Arab List, Ta'al, Hadash, Balad and Islamic Movement in Israel reach agreement to run as a united list[74]
Former Shas chairman Eli Yishai forms a new party, Yachad
Labor (led by Isaac Herzog) and Hatnuah (led by Tzipi Livni) agree to run on a joint list, called Zionist Union[111]
Netanyahu dismisses Yair Lapid and Tzipi Livni from the cabinet
Coalition crisis begins as PM Netanyahu re-launches the Jewish nation-state bill
Interior minister Gideon Sa'ar, no 2 of the leading Likud party, announces that he will take a timeout from politics
Alliance between Likud and Yisrael Beiteinu dissolved
